DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Volunteers Bioavailability Dexpramipexole Tablets Food Effects
DOC.detailed_description: The effect food dexpramipexole bioavailability follow administration propose commercial formulation ( capsule-shaped tablet ) anticipate therapeutic dose ( 150 mg twice daily ) study . Therefore , study design evaluate effect standard high-fat , high-calorie meal dexpramipexole bioavailability follow administration single 150 mg dose healthy volunteer , consistent US Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) European Medicines Agency ( EMA ) recommendation . Additionally , patient ALS difficulty swallow tablet , necessitate alternative method administration drug . Therefore , study also design evaluate bioavailability dexpramipexole mixed water crush soft food ( applesauce ) .

Male subject female subject childbearing potential must practice effective contraception study 90 day last dose study drug . History malignant disease , include solid tumor hematologic malignancy . History clinically significant endocrine , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , major disease , determine Investigator . Surgery within 90 day prior check .
